price: Katakanlah, "Jikalau ada tuhan-tuhan di samping-Nya, sebagaimana yang mereka katakan, niscaya tuhan-tuhan itu mencari jalan kepada Tuhan yang mempunyai arasy".
arabic: قُل لَّوۡ كَانَ مَعَهُۥٓ ءَالِهَةٞ كَمَا يَقُولُونَ إِذٗا لَّٱبۡتَغَوۡاْ إِلَىٰ ذِي ٱلۡعَرۡشِ سَبِيلٗا

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qul law kāna maʿahu ālihatun kamā yaqūlūna idhan la-ib'taghaw ilā dhī al-ʿarshi sabīlan
